author: Xbox
description:
In this episode of the Official Xbox Podcast, we're in Tokyo, Japan, and we're sitting down with the folks from Team Ninja and PlatinumGames to discuss the return of the legendary series, Ninja Gaiden 4. We're diving deep into the visceral, fast-paced, and challenging combat that's made the franchise iconic, while also talking about how Team Ninja and PlatinumGames have come together to create one of the most anticipated games of the year.

00:00 Introduction
02:46 Storytelling and cinematic moments
03:46 Character Insights
05:35 Difficulty settings and customization
10:30 Ninja Coin
12:36 Are there any challenges for the speedrunning community?
14:33 Ryu and Yakumo’s swords brought into real life
15:44 Do either have a dream weapon for Yakumo or Ryu wield?
16:44 Ninja Gaiden 4 on the ROG Xbox Ally 
17:29 Custom controllers
18:50 Outro

Listen to us on Spotify/Apple Podcasts 🎧 
https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/officialxboxpodcast 

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR 

FO
title: Ninja Gaiden 4: Legacy Evolved for a New Era | Official Xbox Podcast

description:

author: Xbox
description:
💚🎄 The wait is over — The Grinch: Christmas Adventures – Merry & Mischievous Edition is OUT NOW!

🎁 New DLC with 6 extra levels & Speed Run Mode
🐾 Team up with Max to collect presents
🛍️ All-new in-game store with puzzles, art & Grinchy gear
🧩 Unlock rewards and gadgets to cause holiday chaos
🎮 Navigate Who-ville solo or team up in 2-player local co-op

Will The Grinch save or steal Christmas? It’s up to you.

author: Xbox
description:
Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage Open Beta is LIVE NOW! 🔥

Square up in the action-packed Open Beta before it ends on Oct 6 at 7:59 PM PDT! 

Experience brand new Crossplay support on Xbox series X|S in smooth battles all thanks to Rollback Netcode 💥

This is your chance to test the next evolution of Virtua Fighter. New consoles and new challengers await. 
 
PLAY NOW: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/virtua-fighter-5-revo-world-stage/9NSM674QVLBS
 
The originator of 3D fighting returns to XBOX when Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage Launches Oct 30th!
